message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000.  It's a fair price considering the value it brings to you. Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, based on my budget, I am only able to offer $1350000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your constraints, but $1350000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1375000. This would allow me to make a reasonable profit while still giving you a good deal. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my assessment, I believe $1360000 would be the maximum I could reasonably pay for the product. I hope we can agree on this price.
